alfredsnippet.name: Splits values into two groups. If an element in `filter` is truthy, the corresponding element in the collection belongs to the first group; otherwise, it belongs to the second group.
alfredsnippet.snippet:
const bifurcate = (arr, filter) =>
  arr.reduce((acc, val, i) => (acc[filter[i] ? 0 : 1].push(val), acc), [[], []]);
